about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: CORPORATE POLICY
about.intro: Welcome to Alphaweld GmbH – your wholesale partner for high-quality welding products. Our corporate policy expresses our self-understanding as a responsible actor in international trade. It combines our quality promise with our commitment to environment, ethics and fair supply chains.

quality.title: Quality and Customer Satisfaction
quality.description: We stand for proven quality, standard-compliant products and reliable service. Our customers benefit from:
items: Complete quality control and conformity assurance
quality.quote: Our customers should not only be able to rely on our products – but also on our word.

sustainability.title: Sustainability & Environmental Protection
sustainability.description: We take responsibility for people and the environment – today and in the future.
items: Cooperation with environmentally certified suppliers (e.g. ISO 14001)

sourcing.title: Responsible Sourcing
sourcing.subtitle: Ethical. Careful. Conflict-free.
sourcing.description: Our purchasing decisions are based on strict criteria:
items: Supply chain due diligence according to LkSG

integrity.title: Integrity & Social Responsibility
integrity.description: Trust is our foundation. We promote:

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.description: Our policy is dynamic – like the market. Therefore:
items: We regularly review and update our processes
We conduct internal audits & supplier evaluations
We learn from feedback – and implement it
